trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, defines an animation segment with its own target value and interpolation method for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Abstrato de classe que, quando implementado, define um segmento de animação com o seu próprio método de valor e interpolação de destino para um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Int32KeyFrame is an abstract class that defines <xref:System.Int32> value type key frames for several different techniques of key frame animation: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Int32KeyFrame é uma classe abstracta que define <xref:System.Int32>valor frames chave do tipo para várias técnicas diferentes da animação fotograma chave: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: To animate a <xref:System.Int32> value with key frames, you define a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames> animation, and populate its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> property with one or more elements that define the key frames.
trans-unit.target: Para animar uma <xref:System.Int32>valor com frames chaves, é possível definir um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames>animação e preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A>propriedade com um ou mais elementos que definem as chaves fotogramas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames.KeyFrames%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32AnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: For XAML syntaxes that take a Int32KeyFrame, you need to specify a non-abstract derived type of Int32KeyFrame as an object element.
trans-unit.target: Para sintaxes XAML que requeira um Int32KeyFrame, tem de especificar um tipo derivado não abstracto de Int32KeyFrame como um elemento de objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the XAML syntax on the reference pages for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes, consulte a sintaxe XAML nas páginas de referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplineInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingInt32KeyFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DiscreteInt32KeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks
trans-unit.target: # # XAML texto utilização Consulte observações

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> classe que tem o destino especificado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>da nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> class that has the specified target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> classe que tem o destino especificado <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>da nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*> of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>da nova <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the interpolated value of a specific key frame at the progress increment provided.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor interpolated de um intervalo específico de chave em que o incremento de progresso fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The base value is typically the initial value of the property being animated or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A> of the previous key frame.
trans-unit.target: O valor base é, geralmente, o valor inicial da propriedade que está a ser animada ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A>da moldura chave anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most implementations will return the value of `baseValue` when `keyFrameProgress` is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das implementações irão devolver o valor de `baseValue` quando `keyFrameProgress` é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a percentagem de tempo decorrido para este frame chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída deste fotograma chave indicado o valor base especificado e o progresso.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if keyFrameProgress is not between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre se keyFrameProgress não se situa entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the value of a key frame at the progress increment provided.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o valor de um fotograma chave no incremento de progresso fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from; typically the value of the previous key frame.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar de; Normalmente, o valor da moldura chave anterior.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a percentagem de tempo decorrido para este frame chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída deste fotograma chave indicado o valor base especificado e o progresso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time at which the key frame's target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a hora em que o destino de chave da moldura <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>deve ser atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The time at which the key frame's current value should be equal to its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> property. The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform*>.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que o valor atual da moldura chave deve ser igual ao respetivo <> </> *> propriedade. O valor predefinido é <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrame.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrame.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key frame's target value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de destino de chave da moldura.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The key frame's target value, which is the value of this key frame at its specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>.
trans-unit.target: Valor de destino da moldura chave, o que é o valor deste fotograma chave no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.KeyTime*> especificado

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `0`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Int32KeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
